attributes.action: Enforce UK Riot Police With LRAD Systems, Tear Gas and Non-lethal munitions in order to control riot better.
attributes.additional_details: The riots in London and recently moving to Birmingham has shown that the UK police force is ill equipped to deal with riots and crowd control, this petition is to enforce the UK police with LRAD systems tear gas and Non-lethal weapons and munitions and give them to actively use them. This will both protect officer better and members of the public
